name: COSMO 4
description:
Cosmo 4 is a horror mystery set on a space ship making its way back to Earth after a long voyage. A dangerous alien creature has escaped containment and it's up to you to figure out who on the ship you can trust and who's a deadly threat in disguise.

For fans of Among Us, Her Story, or Return of the Obra Dinn.

Play time: 15 - 20 minutes.

A game by Ellison Winterstein

-Featuring the voices of-

Daniel James Isabella
Harrison Orwig
Noah Bosch
Carl Schmidt
Ellison Winterstein

Made with Unity and Fungus

Contact: eviltwindigital@gmail.com

For more from Evil Twin Digital: https://tinyurl.com/p5osnjd
